name: Sky High Dash!
description:
Hey fellow people!! This is my first ever Unity game, I made it with Blackthornprod's course, here is the link :) : https://www.udemy.com/course/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-cours...

Sky High Dash is a simple game where you dodge objects falling from the sky!!! I have plans to update it adding things like:
Save Data!
New Worlds!

Download Edition!

Awesome Unlockable Skins!

And maybe more!!!!!!!

Peace! :D
